import React from 'react' import { UilArrowUp, UilArrowDown, UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { formtToLocalTime, iconUrlFromCode } from '../services/weatherService'; function TemperatureAndDetails({weather: {details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity, feels_like, timezone}}) { return (

{details}

{`${temp.toFixed()}째`}

Feels Like: {`${feels_like.toFixed()}째`}
Humidity: {`${humidity.toFixed()}%`}
Wind: {`${speed.toFixed()}km/h`}

Rise: {formtToLocalTime(sunrise, timezone, 'hh:mm a')}

|

Set: {formtToLocalTime(sunset, timezone, 'hh:mm a')}

|

High: {`${temp_max.toFixed()}째`}

|

Low: {`${temp_min.toFixed()}째`}

) } export default TemperatureAndDetails
